text: Alpha Scuti is a orange giant star in the constellation of Scutum. It was discovered that it is originally part of the Aquila constellation, because of this, it was later designated as 1 Aquilae. It is 20 times that of the radius of the Sun, a mass of 1.33 times that of the Sun. It is still faintly visible to the naked eye. Category:Stars
title: Alpha Scuti
